真实商业价值进入区块链的临界点: Turning point to bring real asset into crypto world
区块链转折: A turning point in Blockchain industry
从概念为主-商业价值驱动: From concept driven to business driven
区块链技术的下一个突破是建立商业级的技术平台: The next breakthrough in Blockchain technology is to establish a commercial-scale platform
满足商业需求，促进商业应用与创新: to meet business requirements and spur commercial applications and innovation
Grid作为一条高效可进化的多链区块链: Grid, a multi-Chain parallel processing Blockchain Framework, fulfills requirements to embrace commercialisation.
多样的自定义共识机制，确保主链和侧链的不断自我进化和提升。: Customisable Consensus Protocols, ensuring new features and updates to be implemented in Grid.
操作系统级的: Architecture optimization on the operating system level
最小化内核、智能合约集: Minimum viable system, Smart Contract Collections
满足各类商业场景，减少数据冗杂。: Fulfilling requirements of various commercial applications, reducing data redundancy.
以 Merkel Tree 作为基础，: Using Merkel Tree to establish cross-chain, indexing and communication system.
Grid 整体设计架构，如同建立了一个“商业核心区”，每一个行业都有适合其自身的: Grid architecture forms a highly organised ‘Central Business District’, where each industry has its dedicated Side Chain to fulfil its requirements - one chain to one scenario
系统定制从此: System customisation has never been easier
满足瞬息万变的商业变化和创新机制: Succeed in ever-changing business environment and spur innovation
自定义接口方便对系统进行定制和优化: Customise and optimise the system through interfaces
致力于成为如Linux家族一样的多样性生态系统: Establish a diversified and flexible Eco-system similar to Linux family
Grid 设计了高效的并行运算机制，可满足商业级的运算需求，不用担心一个ICO让: Grid has an efficient parallel processing mechanism, to meet commercial scale application. No more concerns about system congestion when an ICO takes place in the system
如增加公路车道、减少拥堵: Expansion of processing tunnels, reducing congestion
独特的主侧链Merkel Tree 索引，高效处理多链结构，侧链间信息传输支持跨: Unique Merkel Tree Side Chain indexing between Main Chain and Side Chains, messaging between side Chains to promote cross-Chain collaboration
Grid 强调各链的自我进化与提升，吸收新的侧链、引入新的技术: Promotes new Side Chain integration and new feature introduction
各链拥有其共识机制，推动未来新技术的引进: Consensus Protocol to adopt future improvements
侧链可动态加入或脱离Grid，提高侧链间竞争，促进侧链的自我提升: Dynamic Side Chain joining and exiting to introduce competition
1区块链技术的下一个突破是建立商业级的技术平台满足商业需求，促进商业应用与创新。: The next breakthrough in Blockchain technology is to establish a commercial-scale platform, to meet business requirements and spur commercial applications and innovation
Grid基金会将于近期在新加坡建立。作为一个非盈利组织，Grid基金会旨在推动G: Grid Foundation is being set up in Singapore as the Governance entity for Grid. As a non-profit entity, it promotes Grid technology development and applications, facilitating corporates and startups to establish new business and transform themselves in digital business. Grid Foundation will implement comprehensive management and governance model, fully compliant with regulations and laws in Singapore.
代币持有者可交纳少量代币成为基金会员: Token holders become members with annual fees
会员根据其代币持有额度拥有相应投票权: Token amount corresponds to voting rights
基金会致力于积极吸纳商业、资本、技术合作方的进入: Attracts business, technical and capital partners
